## Code try

```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
data("mtcars")
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=as.factor(cyl), y=mpg)) + 
  geom_boxplot(fill="slateblue", alpha=0.2) + 
  xlab("cyl")

```
